children.value: Cell components that can be swiped left or right to display action buttons.
, for defining the contents of the sliding areas on both sides.

props.code:
<z-swipe-cell>
   <template #left>
     <z-button square type="primary" text="select" />
   </template>
   <z-cell :border="false" title="cell" value="content" />
   <template #right>
     <z-button square type="danger" text="Delete" />
     <z-button square type="primary" text="Collection" />
   </template>
</z-swipe-cell>

children.value: can nest any content, such as nesting a product card.

props.code:
<z-swipe-cell>
   <z-card title="title" :cover="cover" header-bordered>
     This is a text
     <template #actions>
       <z-button type="primary" size="mini">Operation</z-button>
     </template>
   </z-card>
   <template #right>
     <z-button
       square
       type="danger"
       text="delete"
       :custom-style="{ height: '100%' }"
     />
   </template>
</z-swipe-cell>

children.value: callback function, you can customize the behavior when the sliding content on both sides is closed.

props.code:
<z-swipe-cell :before-close="beforeClose">
   <template #left>
     <z-button square type="primary" text="select" />
   </template>
   <z-cell :border="false" title="cell" value="content" />
   <template #right>
     <z-button square type="danger" text="Delete" />
   </template>
</z-swipe-cell>

children.value: Identifier, usually a unique string or number, which can be obtained in the event parameters
Specifies the width of the left sliding area in
Specifies the width of the right sliding area, in
to prevent closing, support returning Promise
Contents of the left sliding area
Contents of the right sliding area
The first parameter of beforeClose is an object, which contains the following properties:
Through ref, you can get the SwipeCell instance and call the instance method.
